title: nf-core/phyloplace pipeline - params.phyloplace_input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.phyloplace_input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

queryseqfile.errorMessage: File with query sequences to place in phylogeny. Any format supported by hmmaline in HMMER (e.g. fasta, clustal, phylip, stockholm) or MAFFT.

refseqfile.errorMessage: Multiple sequence alignment of reference sequences. Any format suppored by hmmbuild in HMMER (see queryfile for examples) or MAFFT.

refphylogeny.errorMessage: Newick formatted file with the reference phylogeny.

hmmfile.errorMessage: HMM file to use for alignment, if the reference sequences are not aligned.

model.errorMessage: Phylogenetic model to use in placement, see EPA-NG documentation.

alignmethod.errorMessage: Method to use for aligning: 'hmmer' or 'mafft'.
